traits.following_and_support: Described as women who had followed Jesus from Galilee, ministering to him and providing for him out of their resources.
traits.presence_at_crucifixion: Stand at a distance watching the crucifixion when many male disciples have fled.
traits.witnesses_of_burial: Observe the place where Jesus is laid and how his body is placed in the tomb.
traits.first_at_tomb: Return at dawn after the Sabbath with spices, discover the empty tomb, and receive the angelic announcement of the resurrection.
